column1: | Title                         | Test Case ID | Input Type     | Test Input        | Expected Result                       | Notes                            | Test Result |

| Valid Crew Positive Int       | CM-01        | crew_members   | 100               | Success                               | Crew within normal range         |             |
| Valid Crew High Int           | CM-02        | crew_members   | 200               | Success                               | Over 150 triggers discount logic |             |
| Valid Costume Price Float     | CP-01        | costume_price  | 250.75            | Success                               | Positive float                   |             |
| Valid Costume Price Int       | CP-02        | costume_price  | 100               | Success                               | Positive int accepted            |             |

| Valid Director Name w/ Spaces | DN-02        | director_name  | Christopher Nolan | Success                               | Spaces allowed                   |             |

| Valid Movie Title Multi-word  | MN-02        | movie_name     | The Dark Knight   | Success                               | Multiple words allowed           |             |
| Zero Budget                   | MB-03        | movie_budget   | 0                 | Fail – "Invalid input data provided." | Budget must be > 0               | Fail        |
